Title: Run Task in background
Content: It is possible to run a Task in the background as a service. This means you can run a Task without showing the Robogator GUI. To do this you need to start Robogator via cmd command interpreter and set the Task uuid as parameter. ROBOCODE0 To run a Task with the Task uuid d28cd9b1-3eac-43de-85db-f67098f9fd93 in the background, see the full example in Windows Command Prompt. ROBOIMAGE0 ROBOMASTER
